## Hop.registry property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly registry: {
		images: {
			getAll(project?: `project_${string}` | undefined): Promise<string[]>;
			getManifest(image: string): Promise<
				{
					digest: {
						digest: string;
						size: number;
						uploaded: string;
					};
					tag: string | null;
				}[]
			>;
			delete(image: string): Promise<void>;
		};
	};
```
